column4: hi, while reloading the synaptic packager i got this error message "Could not download all repository indexes". Just now i have installed ubuntu 10.04
reload it, see if it happens again
do i need to configure the URL in under software source, to get udpates from other source? If so please provide me some of the trusted urls
did it fail a second time ?
ok, open the software sources gui, and try one of the other mirrors, that one mirror maybe having a problem

i got this error message "Failed to fetch http://in.archive.ubuntu.com/ubuntu/dists/lucid/Release.gpg  Could not connect to in.archive.ubuntu.com:80 (111.91.91.37). - connect (110: Connection timed out)
yes, and I told you what to do
I am not sure what do you mean by mirror
in the software sources application, there is a list of available ubuntu repos mirrors, select a different one than the in.archive.ubuntu.com mirror
I've just tried to connect to the in.archive.ubuntu.com mirror, and it appears to be down
